title: Online Advanced Foreign Language Communication Proficiency Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic foreign language grammar and vocabulary acquisition
context.additional_context: Utilization of online discussion boards and AI-powered real-time feedback systems to promote learner interaction

learning_goals: Learners must be able to engage in fluent conversations for 15 minutes or more on complex topics related to daily life and professional fields in the target foreign language.
Learners must be able to interpret texts reflecting cultural contexts specific to the language with at least 80% accuracy.
Learners must maintain a participation rate of 90% or higher in weekly online activities (discussions, assignment submissions).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
